text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. title: Deploying COVID19 Risk Planner in production
text: application compatible () databases DBI interface. ’s tested MySQL PostgreSQL. production application uses hosted instance Aurora (MySQL) AWS RDS. See table schemaa. may wish use connection manager, ProxySQL, collate proxy application instance connections Database server. application tested ProxySQL v2.3.2.

title: Deploying COVID19 Risk Planner in production
code: CREATE DATABASE `c19r` /*!40100 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 */;  -- c19r.risk_game_results definition  CREATE TABLE `risk_game_results` (   `GEOID` int(11) NOT NULL,   `data_ts` varchar(100) NOT NULL,   `pred_20` int(11) NOT NULL,   `pred_50` int(11) NOT NULL,   `pred_100` int(11) NOT NULL,   `pred_1000` int(11) NOT NULL,   `g_20` int(11) NOT NULL,   `g_50` int(11) NOT NULL,   `g_100` int(11) NOT NULL,   `g_1000` int(11) NOT NULL,   `ip` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `ts` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,   `latitude` float DEFAULT NULL,   `longitude` float DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_medium` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_content` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_campaign` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;  -- c19r.willingness definition  CREATE TABLE `willingness` (   `source` varchar(100) NOT NULL,   `ts` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,   `asc_bias` int(11) NOT NULL,   `event_size` int(11) NOT NULL,   `answer` varchar(40) NOT NULL,   `ip` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `data_ts` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `vacc_imm` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `latitude` float DEFAULT NULL,   `longitude` float DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_medium` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_content` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,   `utm_campaign` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
code: run_app(   onStart = loadDataOnStart,   options = list(),   enableBookmarking = NULL,   uiPattern = "/",   ... )

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. uiPattern regular expression applied GET request determine whether ui used handle request. Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See `?golem::get_golem_options` details.

title: save_quiz_results — save_quiz_results
code: save_quiz_results(   db,   geoid,   data_ts,   p20,   p50,   p100,   p1000,   g20,   g50,   g100,   g1000,   ip,   lat,   long,   utm_source,   utm_medium,   utm_content,   utm_campaign )

title: save_quiz_results — save_quiz_results
text: db Database, global env (see [loadDataOnStart()]) geoid Geoid location selected data_ts Timestamp quiz submission p20 Predicted event size = 20 p50 Predicted event size = 50 p100 Predicted event size = 100 p1000 Predicted event size = 1000 g20 Guess event size = 20 g50 Guess event size = 50 g100 Guess event size = 100 g1000 Guess event size = 1000 ip User ip known, `globals$ip()` lat User latitude, 0 unknown.  Typically `globals$latitude()` long User longitude, 0 unknown.  Typically `globals$longitude()` utm_source `utm_source=` value query string 'NULL' utm_medium `utm_medium=` value query string 'NULL' utm_content `utm_content=` value query string 'NULL' utm_campaign `utm_campaign=` value query string 'NULL'

title: save_willingness — save_willingness
text: db Database pool object source willingness asked, e.g. "game" "map" asc_bias Ascertainment bias asked map, set -1 uses event_size Event size asked map, set -1 uses answer Willingness answer, come willingness scale ip User ip known, typically `globals$ip()`` vacc_imm Vaccine immunity overlay setting map latitude User latitude, 0 unknown.  Typically `globals$latitude()` longitude User longitude, 0 unknown.  Typically `globals$longitude()` utm_source `utm_source=` value query string 'NULL' utm_medium `utm_medium=` value query string 'NULL' utm_content `utm_content=` value query string 'NULL' utm_campaign `utm_campaign=` value query string 'NULL'

title: covid19RiskPlanner 1.1.0
text: Integrate Global map leaflet Fix quiz consent catching “yes” tabs

title: covid19RiskPlanner 1.0.4
text: Map sidebar text now generated Small grammar fixes

title: covid19RiskPlanner 1.0.3
text: Documentation updates pkgdown site Add action icons replace text US map tab Expand EU ascertainment bias 2, 3, 5 Fix NYT data loading folder empty Update imports Start using c19rdata library init risk info

title: covid19RiskPlanner 1.0.2
text: Support per-county vaccine overlays Add Kansas City Joplin distinct regions Fix downloads real time images Use custom data paths Use externally updated data

title: covid19RiskPlanner 1.0
text: App fully ported golem Now uses shiny modules reactive() liberally Database secrets passed via ENV docker saved currently scoped .Renviron
